Distributor: Fox, Twentieth Television, RKO Radio Pictures, 20th Century Fox
Production Co: Midsummer Films, Fox Searchlight, Christopher Milburn Production, Isle of Man Film
Synopsis: To the dismay of her suitor (Lee Ross) and family, a young woman (Samantha Morton) becomes enamored of a childhood hero (Rupert Graves).
Title: Dreaming of Joseph Lees
